message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it. Can you consider that?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice! However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still willing to work with you. I can do $108, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $108 and my original offer of $100. Would you consider $102?
I'm glad we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I can see you're serious about buying the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll meet you at $109. That's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $106?

I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm going to make one final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $110, but that's it. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand this is your final offer, Alice. I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and my original offer of $100. Would you consider $105?
